description: The HpeSNMPAlertDestination resource describes the properties for SNMP Alert Destinations.  The alert destination configuration up to 8 remote management systems that receive SNMP alerts from the BMC.

AlertDestination.description: The IP address or FQDN of remote management system that receive SNMP alerts.

SNMPAlertProtocol.description: Indicate the SNMP protocol associated with the AlertDestination.

enumDescriptions.SNMPv1Trap: Indicate SNMPv1 trap is enabled for the destination.
enumDescriptions.SNMPv3Inform: Indicate SNMPv3 Inform is enabled for the destination. Needs to fill the SecurityName as well.
enumDescriptions.SNMPv3Trap: Indicate SNMPv3 trap is enabled for the destination. Needs to fill the SecurityName as well.

SNMPv3User.description: SNMPv3 User associated with the destination when SNMP alert protocol is SNMPv3trap.

SecurityName.description: Provides the SNMPv3 security name associated with SNMPv3trap or SNMPv3Inform set on SNMPAlertProtocol.

TrapCommunity.description: The configured SNMPv1 trap community string.

title: #HpeSNMPAlertDestination.v2_0_0.HpeSNMPAlertDestination
